#Overview
This is the main analysis file. It takes a dataset of craigslist texts with two 40-topic STM fits, and runs analysis to assess the association with neighborhood racial proportions.

```{r load libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(forcats)
```

#Load Data
```{r}
data <- read_csv('data/hlm_cl.csv')
``` 

```{r}
coef_sum <- estimate_effects(data, focal_covariates = c("black_proportion", "asian_proportion", "latinx_proportion"), other_covariates = c("cleanRent", "cleanSqft", "pop_thousands", "log_income"))
plot_coef_sum(coef_sum)
```

```{r}
plot_coef_sum(coef_sum)
```

```{r}
coef_sum %>% arrange(desc(abs(coefs)))
```
